  • Method Details

    • registerCenter

      public boolean registerCenter(int ownerId, String centerName, String location, int slots)
      Registers a new gym center for the specified owner. This involves creating a new gym center record in the database with the given details.
      Specified by:
      registerCenter in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      ownerId - - the ID of the gym owner
      centerName - - the name of the gym center
      location - - the location of the gym center
      slots - - the number of slots available at the center
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, otherwise false

    • addnewSlot

      public boolean addnewSlot(int centerId, GymSlots slot)
      Adds a new slot to an existing gym center. The new slot will be added with the provided details such as start time, end time, and cost.
      Specified by:
      addnewSlot in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      centerId - - the ID of the gym center to which the slot is added
      slot - - the GymSlots object containing details of the new slot (start time, end time, cost)
      Returns:
      true if the slot is added successfully, otherwise false

    • deleteSlot

      public boolean deleteSlot(int centerId, LocalTime startTime)
      Deletes an existing slot from a gym center based on start time. If the slot with the given start time exists, it will be removed.
      Specified by:
      deleteSlot in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      centerId - - the ID of the gym center
      startTime - - the start time of the slot to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the slot is deleted successfully, otherwise false

    • deleteCenter

      public boolean deleteCenter(int centerId)
      Deletes a gym center from the database. The center will be removed along with all associated slots and data.
      Specified by:
      deleteCenter in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      centerId - - the ID of the gym center to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the center is deleted successfully, otherwise false

    • editProfile

      public boolean editProfile(GymOwner owner)
      Allows the gym owner to edit their profile details. The profile information such as name, email, and other details are updated.
      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      owner - - the GymOwner object containing the updated profile information
      Returns:
      true if the profile is updated successfully, otherwise false

    • createProfile

      public boolean createProfile(GymOwner owner)
      Allows the gym owner to create a new profile. This method registers a new gym owner in the system with the provided profile details.
      Specified by:
      createProfile in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      owner - - the GymOwner object containing the profile details to be created
      Returns:
      true if the profile is created successfully, otherwise false

    • updatepwd

      public boolean updatepwd(String email, String password, String role)
      Updates the password for the gym owner. The new password is set for the gym owner based on the provided email and role.
      Specified by:
      updatepwd in interface GymOwnerBusiness
      Parameters:
      email - - the email of the gym owner
      password - - the new password to set
      role - - the role of the user (could be used for additional permission handling)
      Returns:
      true if the password is updated successfully, otherwise false
